channel.title: Real-Scape Sectors (Eco \ PK) All in ONE
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://unrivaledx.com/sectors/real-scape.png[/img]
Current Developers Me(jay), Dzermin, Mike2k9
[img]http://unrivaledx.com/sectors/information.png[/img]
[b]I have remade Real-Scape tons of times sense 2008. I just started new development work on this server. We have been working on this for the past few days. We are going to call this Real-Scape Sectors, due to the fact that this is like two servers in one. I know you see the eco/spawn servers. But this is different, because you choose a path of either PK or ECO. If your PK your home is in Edgeville, you can spawn, level with command, etc. If your ECO your home is in Yanille and like a normal Eco server well you level and get your items to correct way. PK players cannot trade ECO players. This was an idea in my head for a while now and I finally got it into a server.[/b]
We are currently in BETA, and decided to post this to see if anyone is interested in BETA. If you want to join in on BETA, you can contact me via PM. We are also looking for more to join our Development Team, if your interested you can PM me.
[img]http://unrivaledx.com/sectors/features.png[/img]
[code]* Added pretty much all of 2007 Runescape's spawns * Added drops to most of the npc's used to train on. * Fixed tons of doors around the map. * Fixed weird shop issue that was throwing an exception. * Added ::banki (Bank all your inventory) command. * Mystery Boxes and Antique Lamps have been added to all drops. * Added a better NPC Clipping System. * Separated the server into 2 sectors, PK & ECO - PK PLAYERS; * Can spawn using ::item (restricted). * Can Levelup using ::lvl (id) (desired level). * Start in Edgeville, but will have multiple teleports to different pk location. * Have a PK Point System. * Cannot trade with ECO Players. * Does not participate in highscores. - ECO PLAYERS; * Start in Yanille. * Participate in highscores. * Can still PK if they want. * Cannot spawn. * Cannot lvl using ::lvl. * Has tons of teleports to almost anywhere on the map.[/code]
[img]http://unrivaledx.com/sectors/media.png[/img]
[img]http://unrivaledx.com/sectors/start.png[/img] [img]http://unrivaledx.com/sectors/cooking.png[/img] [img]http://unrivaledx.com/sectors/crafting.png[/img] [img]http://unrivaledx.com/sectors/fishing.png[/img] [img]http://unrivaledx.com/sectors/mining.png[/img] [img]http://unrivaledx.com/sectors/prayerleveling.png[/img] [img]http://unrivaledx.com/sectors/smelting.png[/img] [img]http://unrivaledx.com/sectors/smithing.png[/img] [img]http://unrivaledx.com/sectors/thieving.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: Real-Scape Sectors (Eco \ PK) All in ONE
item.dc:creator: @mgl mgl
item.description:
@mgl wrote:

OT: How does dropping items or items dropped from monsters work with ECO-path players being unable to interact with PK-path players? Unless there are safeguards in place it seems like it would be really easy to get one or two friends, have them spawn in OP gear and then go to GWD with them and just pick up the drops.

Thanks for pointing that out, I have been fixing every way possible for them two not to trade items. Because I am trying to keep the ECO. There is always two types of players, pkers and the economy guys. So I want to make this enjoyable for both. And keep it so both types of players can still interact.

Read full topic
item.source: Real-Scape Sectors (Eco \ PK) All in ONE

item.title: Real-Scape Sectors (Eco \ PK) All in ONE
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Check your thread, you have plenty of simple spelling mistakes in it.

OT: How does dropping items or items dropped from monsters work with ECO-path players being unable to interact with PK-path players? Unless there are safeguards in place it seems like it would be really easy to get one or two friends, have them spawn in OP gear and then go to GWD with them and just pick up the drops.

+1 for emphasizing BETA being about finding glitches and issues, and not just being a pre-release for players.

Read full topic

item.title: Real-Scape Sectors (Eco \ PK) All in ONE
item.dc:creator: @mgl mgl
item.description:
@mgl wrote:

[center]

Current Developers
Me(jay), Dzermin, Mike2k9

I have remade Real-Scape tons of times sense 2008. I just started new development work on this server. We have been working on this for the past few days. We are going to call this Real-Scape Sectors, due to the fact that this is like two servers in one. I know you see the eco/spawn servers. But this is different, because you choose a path of either PK or ECO. If your PK your home is in Edgeville, you can spawn, level with command, etc. If your ECO your home is in Yanille and like a normal Eco server well you level and get your items to correct way. PK players cannot trade ECO players. This was an idea in my head for a while now and I finally got it into a server.

We are currently in BETA, and decided to post this to see if anyone is interested in BETA. If you want to join in on BETA, you can contact me via PM. We are also looking for more to join our Development Team, if your interested you can PM me.

[code]* Added pretty much all of 2007 Runescape’s spawns

  • Added drops to most of the npc’s used to train on.
  • Fixed tons of doors around the map.
  • Fixed weird shop issue that was throwing an exception.
  • Added ::banki (Bank all your inventory) command.
  • Mystery Boxes and Antique Lamps have been added to all drops.
  • Added a better NPC Clipping System.
  • Separated the server into 2 sectors, PK & ECO
    • PK PLAYERS;
      • Can spawn using ::item (restricted).
      • Can Levelup using ::lvl (id) (desired level).
      • Start in Edgeville, but will have multiple teleports to different pk location.
      • Have a PK Point System.
      • Cannot trade with ECO Players.
      • Does not participate in highscores.
    • ECO PLAYERS;
      • Start in Yanille.
      • Participate in highscores.
      • Can still PK if they want.
      • Cannot spawn.
      • Cannot lvl using ::lvl.
      • Has tons of teleports to almost anywhere on the map.[/code]










[/center]

Read full topic
